sentences.en: After a shower like this, the grassland becomes even greener and has a fresher scent.
sentences.cn: 象缀满草尖上的水珠,却又象数不清的金刚钻.

sentences.en: B Yes, perhaps. But it's really green. Greener than Athens, certainly.
sentences.cn: B是的, 也许是. 但是这里确实是绿色的. 比雅典要绿, 当然.

sentences.en: Because of new laws, our city has become cleaner and greener.
sentences.cn: 由于有新的法律, 我们的城市变得更干净和更绿化.

sentences.en: But Carlos Amaya knew he wanted to make the business even greener.
sentences.cn: 但卡洛斯-阿梅亚知道,他自己更愿意将餐馆经营得更加绿色环保.

sentences.en: Have you heard of Greener China?
sentences.cn: 你听说过“绿化中国”这个组织 吗 ?

sentences.en: He was very happy with us but wanted to see if the grass was greener elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 他对我们感到十分满意，但还想看看是否有更合适的人选。

sentences.en: Her cabbages , which she carefully kept free from slugs, were growing daily greener.
sentences.cn: 黄芽白和莲花白,都常常捉着虫的,一天比一天长得青绿.

sentences.en: How long have you been in Greener China?
sentences.cn: 你加入“绿化中国”有多久了?

sentences.en: I want to join Greener China, but I don't know how.
sentences.cn: 我想加入“绿化中国”组织, 可不知道怎么做.

sentences.en: Mr Hansson also believes that ordinary Norwegians should live greener lives.
sentences.cn: 汉森先生同样相信,普通的挪威人应该过上更绿色的生活.

sentences.en: People always think the glass is greener anywhere, but where they are.
sentences.cn: 人们总是想着草在任何地方都是翠绿的, 但是它们是在哪里呐.

sentences.en: The grass is always greener on the other side of the fence.
sentences.cn: 另一边的草,看来总是绿些.这山望着那山高.

sentences.en: The weeping willows looked fresher and greener after the rain.
sentences.cn: 雨后,垂柳显得格外青翠.

sentences.en: What have you done since you joined Greener China?
sentences.cn: 你加入绿色中国组织以来都做了什么?

sentences.en: You mean you are a member of Greener China?
sentences.cn: 你的意思是你是“绿化中国”的成员?

words.tran_cn: 绿色的（green的比较级）；未熟的

trans.tran_cn: 绿色的；草绿色的；长满青草的；绿油油的；青葱的；未成熟的；青的；生的（green的比较级）
